mapper.insert: insert into meet_reply(MRNO,MNO,ID,REPLY,LAYER, BUNDLE,BUNORDER,NICK,REGDT,UPTDT) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{mno}, #{id},#{reply}, #{layer}, #{bundle}, #{bunOrder}, (select nick from user_info where id = #{id}), sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update meet_reply set reply = #{reply}, UPTDT = sysdate where MRNO = #{mRno}
mapper.select: select MRNO,MNO,ID,MRNO2,REPLY,LAYER, BUNDLE,BUNORDER,NICK,REGDT,UPTDT,DELDT from meet_reply where mno = #{mno} and DELDT is null order by mno asc
